eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A REQUIRED MONTHLY TEST FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Kansas; AT 11:50 PM ON OCT 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:50 AM OCT 14, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is a coordinated monthly test of all broadcast stations in Kansas and the Kansas City metropolitan area, sent from the Kansas Division of Emergency Management in Topeka.
